data.name: FreeStyle Football Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
No Control, Just Play!
Freestyle Football Starter Package

Let's take a variety of items at a discounted price of 80%.

This package contains,
  • Clothes Pack Capsule 1ea
  • Skill slot 1ea
  • 10,000 Points
  • 10,000 Exp
  • Lord Sponsor Item



If you have a male character, you will receive a Clothes Pack Capsule type A.
Clothes Pack Capsule type A contains Friday PKG, Secret Agent PKG, ScareCrow PKG and can get one of them.

If you have a female character, you will receive a Clothes Pack Capsule type B.
Clothes Pack Capsule type B contains Bad Dream PKG, Bunny Girl PKG, Devil Girl PKG and can get one of them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window XP
  • Processor: P4 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 7
  • Processor: P4 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
